definition: young of any of various fur-bearing animals, supply with a set of articles or tools
details:
noun
- young of any of various fur-bearing animals
= example: young of any of various fur-bearing animals
- gear consisting of a set of articles or tools for a specified purpose
= synonyms: outfit
- a case for containing a set of articles
verb
- supply with a set of articles or tools
= synonyms: kit out, kit up
